title: Get your ping balance ledger
description: Gets the ping balance ledger for the logged in member
permission_required: MyTradeMeRead: Read your membership & listing data.

query.name: date_from
query.description: Exclude transactions before this date. Specify dates in the UTC time zone.

query.name: date_to
query.description: Exclude transactions after this date. Specify dates in the UTC time zone.

query.name: page
query.description: The page number of the set of results to return, starting from 1. Defaults to 1.

query.name: rows
query.description: The number of results per page; also the maximum number of results to return. Defaults to 50 and supports a maximum of 50

fields.name: TotalCount
fields.description: The total number of results in the collection. Can be larger than the number of returned results.

fields.name: Page
fields.description: The index of the current page of results (starts at 1).

fields.name: PageSize
fields.description: The number of results in the current page.

fields.name: List
fields.description: A list of the results in the current page.

fields.name: TransactionId
fields.type:
TransactionId 
 Integer or null 

Ping transaction ID.



 TransactionType 
 Enumeration 

Ping transaction type.



 TransactionDate 
 DateTime 

Date transaction was made in UTC time zone



 TransactionParts 
 Collection of <TransactionPart> or null 

The transaction parts.






 TransactionPartType 
 Enumeration 

Type of the Transaction part.



 Title 
 String or null 

Title of the Transaction part.



 Amount 
 Number 

Amount of the Transaction part.



 GstCollected 
 Number or null 

GST Collected from this transaction part.



 ReferenceNumber 
 String or null 

The transaction part's reference number for correlation across systems and bank account and credit card statements. Purchase references begin with "P", Withdrawals begin with "W", Top-ups begin "TU", Refunds begin with "R", Peer to Peer and Donations with "Q"



 Sku 
 String or null 

Sku of the Transaction part if its a purchase.






 FundSources 
 <FundSources> or null 

Sources of fund used in a transaction.

                                Deprecated - use PaymentFrom instead of FundSources
                            






 AvailableBalance 
 Number or null 

The current available ping balance for use in funding a purchase.



 FundSources 
 Collection of <FundSource> or null 

The collection of credit/debit card or bank account funding sources






 Type 
 Enumeration 

The type of fund source. If the type is unrecognised, the API client should ignore this fund source and move on to the next one.



 FundSourceId 
 Integer 

A unique ID that can be passed to the purchase API to identify the fund source to use.



 MaskedAccountNumber 
 String or null 

A string containing the card or bank account number, with most of the digits blacked out for privacy reasons (e.g. "**** **** **** 1234" for a CC or "12 3456 ****789 00" for a bank account).



 Label 
 String or null 

The user-provided label, if the user entered one for this fund source, or a generic label like "Visa credit card" otherwise.



 Logo 
 String or null 

The URL to the card or bank logo. API clients should not assume any fixed dimensions, but instead scale the image to fit the space available. Logos are likely to be either square or wider than they are tall.



 DarkModeLogo 
 String or null 

The URL to the card or bank logo for dark mode. API clients should not assume any fixed dimensions, but instead scale the image to fit the space available. Logos are likely to be either square or wider than they are tall.



 VerificationStatus 
 Enumeration or null 

The verification status of a bank account. Not applicable for credit/debit card fund sources.



 Amount 
 Number or null 

Amount taken from the fund source.



 VerificationCodeCreationDate 
 DateTime or null 

The date of the last sent verification code or null if a verification code has not been sent. This will be null if either no verification is required(see Status) or the batch payment process that includes the verification code for this fund source has not yet run(currently once per business day).









 PaymentFrom 
 Collection of <FundSource> or null 

Fund sources the payment was made from




                                 (This type has already been defined)
                        


 FundDestinations 
 <FundDestinations> or null 

Destination of fund going out of the Ping account.

                                Deprecated - use PaymentTo instead of FundDestinations
                            






 Amount 
 Number or null 

The current available ping balance for use in funding a purchase.



 FundDestinations 
 Collection of <FundDestination> or null 

The collection of credit/debit card or bank account fund destinations.






 BankAccountId 
 Integer 

Id used to identify the bank account



 MaskedAccountNumber 
 String or null 

Masked account number eg. "12 3456 ****789 00"



 Status 
 Enumeration 

The bank account status



 Label 
 String or null 

Personal label to identify the account



 Logo 
 String or null 

Fund destination logo



 DarkModeLogo 
 String or null 

Fund destination logo for dark mode



 SortOrder 
 Integer or null 

the order of the account, 0 being the preferential account



 Amount 
 Number or null 

Amount added to the fund destination.



 VerificationCodeCreationDate 
 DateTime or null 

The date of the last sent verification code or null if a verification code has not been sent. This will be null if either no verification is required(see Status) or the batch payment process that includes the verification code for this fund source has not yet run(currently once per business day).









 PaymentTo 
 Collection of <FundSource> or null 

Fund sources the payment was made to




                                 (This type has already been defined)
                        


 Amount 
 Number or null 

Money either credited/deducted from the Ping account.



 Balance 
 Number 

Available balance for the Ping account at the end of the transaction.



 Fees 
 Number or null 

Total of all Fee amounts in the transaction parts.



 Gst 
 Number or null 

Total of all Fee amounts in the transaction parts.



 Title 
 String or null 

The action causing a balance change or the listing title for purchases and sales. Refer to transaction parts for multi item purchase or topups



 ListingId 
 String or null 

The listing id. Refer transaction parts ListingId cart and purchase + topups



 ReferenceNumber 
 String or null 

The transaction's reference number for correlation across systems and bank account and credit card statements. Purchase references begin with "P", Cart purchases begin with "C", Withdrawals begin with "W", Top-ups begin "TU", Refunds begin with "R", Peer to Peer and Donations with "Q"



 Sku 
 String or null 

Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) of the listing



 Subtitle 
 String or null 

Additional information regarding the transaction's action



 IsCart 
 Boolean 

Determines whether or not this transaction was used to complete a cart purchase.
fields.description: Integer or null

fields.name: TransactionId
fields.description: Ping transaction ID.

fields.name: TransactionType
fields.description: Ping transaction type.

enum.name: PurchaseReverse
enum.description: Purchase made as a buyer - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: SaleReverse
enum.description: Sale made as a seller - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: WithdrawalReverse
enum.description: Ping balance transfer out - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: CartPurchase
enum.description: Cart purchase made as a buyer

enum.name: Peer
enum.description: Peer to Peer transaction, Donations will appear as Peer to Peer

enum.name: CartPurchaseReverse
enum.description: Cart purchase made as a buyer - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: RefundToAccountReverse
enum.description: Refund given as a seller - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: RefundFromAccountReverse
enum.description: Refund received as a buyer - reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: RefundFromAccountRelease
enum.description: Refund received as a buyer - transferred to balance by admin

enum.name: PurchaseReverseRelease
enum.description: Purchase made as a buyer reversed and released

enum.name: TopUpReverse
enum.description: Top up Ping account reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: PurchaseAndTopupReverse
enum.description: Purchase and top up reversed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: PurchaseAndTopUpCancelledRetry
enum.description: Purchase and top up cancelled retry

enum.name: TopUpReverseRelease
enum.description: Top up Ping account reversed and released by Trust and Safety

enum.name: PurchaseAndTopupReverseRelease
enum.description: Purchase and top up reversed and released by Trust and Safety

enum.name: TopUpReverseUnclaimed
enum.description: Top up Ping account reversed and moved to unclaimed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: PurchaseAndTopupReverseUnclaimed
enum.description: Purchase and top up reversed and moved to unclaimed by Trust and Safety

enum.name: PurchaseAndTopUpHold
enum.description: Purchase and top up on hold

enum.name: CartPurchaseReverseRelease
enum.description: Cart purchase reversed and then released

enum.name: CartPurchaseAndTopUpReverse
enum.description: Cart purchase and top up reversed

enum.name: CartPurchaseAndTopUpReverseRelease
enum.description: Cart purchase and top up reversed and then released

fields.description: Enumeration

fields.name: Type
fields.description: The type of fund source. If the type is unrecognised, the API client should ignore this fund source and move on to the next one.

enum.name: CreditCard
enum.description: The fund source is a credit/debit card.

enum.name: BankAccount
enum.description: The fund source is a bank account.

enum.name: PingBalance
enum.description: The fund source is the Ping balance. Cannot be used in a purchase or top up. In a purchase use UseBalance = true instead.

enum.name: TmLoyalty
enum.description: The fund source is the Loyalty Subscription.

enum.name: OpenBank
enum.description: The fund source is Open Banking.

fields.name: FundSourceId
fields.description: A unique ID that can be passed to the purchase API to identify the fund source to use.

fields.name: MaskedAccountNumber
fields.description: A string containing the card or bank account number, with most of the digits blacked out for privacy reasons (e.g. "**** **** **** 1234" for a CC or "12 3456 ****789 00" for a bank account).

fields.name: Label
fields.description: The user-provided label, if the user entered one for this fund source, or a generic label like "Visa credit card" otherwise.

fields.name: Logo
fields.description: The URL to the card or bank logo. API clients should not assume any fixed dimensions, but instead scale the image to fit the space available. Logos are likely to be either square or wider than they are tall.

fields.name: DarkModeLogo
fields.description: The URL to the card or bank logo for dark mode. API clients should not assume any fixed dimensions, but instead scale the image to fit the space available. Logos are likely to be either square or wider than they are tall.

fields.name: VerificationStatus
fields.description: The verification status of a bank account. Not applicable for credit/debit card fund sources.

enum.name: Enabled
enum.description: Represents a bank account that had not been verified and does not need to be verified. If you are checking if enabled, please also check for verified, as they are both statuses that allows a bank account to be used.

enum.name: Verified
enum.description: Represents a verified bank account. This is the same as enabled, but with a past verification taking place. If you are checking if verified, please also check for enabled, as they are both statuses that allows a bank account to be used.

enum.name: VerificationRequired
enum.description: Represents a bank account that needs verification.

fields.name: Amount
fields.description: Amount taken from the fund source.

fields.name: VerificationCodeCreationDate
fields.description: The date of the last sent verification code or null if a verification code has not been sent. This will be null if either no verification is required(see Status) or the batch payment process that includes the verification code for this fund source has not yet run(currently once per business day).

fields.name: PaymentFrom
fields.description: Fund sources the payment was made from

fields.name: FundDestinations
fields.description:
Destination of fund going out of the Ping account.

                                Deprecated - use PaymentTo instead of FundDestinations

fields.name: Amount
fields.type:
Amount 
 Number or null 

The current available ping balance for use in funding a purchase.



 FundDestinations 
 Collection of <FundDestination> or null 

The collection of credit/debit card or bank account fund destinations.






 BankAccountId 
 Integer 

Id used to identify the bank account



 MaskedAccountNumber 
 String or null 

Masked account number eg. "12 3456 ****789 00"



 Status 
 Enumeration

 Label 
 String or null 

Personal label to identify the account



 Logo 
 String or null 

Fund destination logo



 DarkModeLogo 
 String or null 

Fund destination logo for dark mode



 SortOrder 
 Integer or null 

the order of the account, 0 being the preferential account



 Amount 
 Number or null 

Amount added to the fund destination.



 VerificationCodeCreationDate 
 DateTime or null 

The date of the last sent verification code or null if a verification code has not been sent. This will be null if either no verification is required(see Status) or the batch payment process that includes the verification code for this fund source has not yet run(currently once per business day).
